title: Problem with the new players premium chests
body: Good afternoon, I would like to complain about a problem, I started playing today and already got my level 5, but have not received my two premium chests and I wonder why. Already I confirmed my email when I created the account. anyone can help me?

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, and it looks like you already received the [new player chest ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)and opened earlier today.  The results yielded Ashe, Garen, Sherwood Forest Ashe, and 120 blue essences.  Keep in mind that in total you received a new player chest and day one hextech chest- not 2 new player chests.  Hopefully, that helps clear things up!
